declaration-no-important.message: !important declarations are STRICTLY PROHIBITED. Use proper CSS specificity instead.

max-nesting-depth.message: Nesting depth exceeds 3 levels. Consider flattening your CSS structure for better performance.

selector-max-id.message: ID selectors are discouraged. Use classes with BEM methodology for better maintainability.

selector-max-specificity.message: Selector specificity too high (max: 0,3,0). Reduce complexity to improve maintainability.

selector-max-compound-selectors.message: Too many compound selectors. Keep chains simple for better performance.

number-max-precision.message: Decimal precision should not exceed 2 places for browser compatibility.

selector-max-universal.message: Universal selectors can impact performance. Use sparingly.

selector-max-attribute.message: Too many attribute selectors can impact performance.

selector-class-pattern.message: Class names must follow BEM methodology with 'mt-' prefix: mt-block__element--modifier

custom-property-pattern.message: CSS custom properties must use 'mt-' prefix and lowercase kebab-case

selector-no-qualifying-type.message: Avoid qualifying selectors with element types for better performance

selector-max-type.message: Too many type selectors can impact performance and specificity
